app_descript:
App Name: Argos

App Package Name: com.homeretailgroup.argos.android

Brief: Argos delivers a hassle-free shopping experience allowing users to quickly reserve items, manage a personal wishlist, and check product availability with ease. From securing a same-day delivery to curating a gift list, Argos aims to be the go-to app for all your shopping needs, while also seeking community insights to remain a ‚Äòmust-have‚Äô on your device.
